resources.string: The number of recent "perfect sessions" (in which the card is guessed correctly in one try) required for it to be considered "fully mastered" (100%).
When calculating mastery level, choose whether forgetting studied cards over time should be considered.
Adjusts the rate at which mastery level decreases over time. At 100%, mastery level is halved every hour. Guessing a card correctly in one try significantly reduces its forgetting rate.
Decks at or below this level are considered "first priority" and will appear in the "Priority decks" section.
Time required after studying a deck for it to be able to appear/reappear in the "Priority decks" section.
